attributes.action: state the Government's opposition to form of military attack on Iran.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The danger of military action in such a volatle region is already causing fear in the Middle Ease thereby making the region even more volatile. We urge the Government to state it's opposition to any military action in Iran. The consequences of such actions are incalcuble and far reaching and would likely spread further, involving us all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
